name: Puzzzle Beta 0.6.5
description:
This is Puzzzle Beta version 0.6.5 It is NOT finished yet, however it is here. It will be updated, so be on the look out! The main reason this beta trash exists is so YOU can find bugs I can't. 

And with that, PLEASE contact me either via my youtube channel, where you can see how I develop this piece of tras- I mean great game. https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCml-viGca-dM4on3BxwkrzA?view_as=subscriber OR you can leave a review here, OR you can e-mail me. 

alvincrossand@gmail.com

Thanks bucko, I'll see you around...
